sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_snc_cls_idea"> <x_snc_cls_idea action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>false</active> <description>Default values (2nd parm), assume everything is a string</description> <episode display_value="NOWCommunity Live Stream - 2019-07-26">0f1f2fb2dbf2b300a8a21637059619b9</episode> <name>Fun with properties</name> <script><![CDATA[var myString = gs.getProperty('my_string_property', 'Hello'); var myInt = gs.getProperty('my_int_property'); var myBool = gs.getProperty('my_bool_property');]]></script> <sys_created_by>chuck.tomasi</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2019-05-27 13:47:42</sys_created_on> <sys_id>851aeaebdb2df380a8a21637059619bf</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>chuck.tomasi</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2019-07-26 18:31:12</sys_updated_on> </x_snc_cls_idea> </record_update>
